name: Photon Rush
description: Perfect game to have fun together. Enjoy a great time with friends and family. You can play and share emotions with up to 16 people. Race and dodge obstacles with real emotions. Only 30 seconds to emerge the winner.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10 Graphics: Dedicated GPU Recommended Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.2+
